Reviews.Title: this is a cool camera
Reviews.Author: Paul M
Reviews.Content: nice camera, a little smaller then i expected but takes really nice pictures. i was a little disappointed that there was no printed owners manual. i have always had pentax 35mm slr cameras this is my first dslr. i can't wait to use it more and really see what it can do. i would recomend this to anyone who is looking for an entry level good quality camera. this camera also came with a nice accessorie package.

Reviews.Title: Does All We Need.
Reviews.Author: RANDOLPH KRONE SR
Reviews.Content: Ordered two (2) of these. I have used mine a little and the wife has used her's a ton. She really is in charge of picture taking. This is really a nice unit. Even a old dude like me (71) can take great photos. This is really the first one that I have had of my own and it works great and is easy to use. I like it. Takes great photos with ease.

ProductInfo.Features:
16MP 'Bridge' Digital Camera
26x Megazoom Lens, 22.3-580mm Equivalent
Auto Picture and Fast Face Detection
Full HD 1080p Widescreen Video
HDMI Output for HDTV Screening
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax X-5 Digital Camera (Black) w/ TWO 8GB High Speed Memory Card, AA Battery & Rapid Charger, Full Size Tripod, Carrying Case Plus More
